text:
Hi Everyone, We are looking for a sharp HubSpot expert, with a high sense of business, and proud in the work they do (high-quality work) is what we are looking for.

To help assist me in day-to-day HubSpot tasks. The work includes workflow automation, reporting, custom properties, building out pipelines, etc.

This can turn into a full-time opportunity as well. Thanks,

topic: Post Job opportunities and if you’re looking for work. Also projects you’re looking for a dev for. Please limit any individual posts to once weekly at most.

Blend are looking to hire a *Senior Developer*. Can be remote, but must be able to work within a UK timezone.

You can <https://www.blendb2b.com/careers|read more about the role (and others) here>. Thanks.
